If relationships are messy, then family is bedlam.

story:
Short Summary

Hello,

My name is Chuck Rayner and I am the producer, writer, and director of my TV show "The Paramedic Angel" that I am very excited about. I have actually worked as a paramedic for many years before I became a filmmaker and this is the reason why I am very passionate about this project as it is something near and dear to my heart. Also, being that my production company is an official partner-in-hope with St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, I will be giving 3% back to them from all pledges that we receive during our campaign.

This campaign is extremely important because for the main reason that I know the real struggles that paramedics deal with everyday trying to save the lives of others as well as doing their best to not let their emotions interfere with their family life. Also, the importance of this campaign is even greater as we honor all the first responders and healthcare workers during this pandemic that our world is experiencing.

Every contribution that we receive from our supporters are going to have a huge impact with helping us achieve our funding goal for the project. Being able to reach our goal will help us achieve the necessary equipment, compensation for our extremely hardworking and talented cast and crew, as well as food on the set and more importantly help with distribution for the show.

What We Need & What You Get

For our production, ideally we would need $30,000 that will help with the costs of obtaining the best up to date equipment, wardrobe, food on set for the cast and crew, and all of the post-production costs of editing and distribution.

In addition, for all of our supporters who donate to the production, we have some really amazing perks to offer. Such as, shadow the director on the set, meet and greet with cast, signed cast poster, and an actual ride along on the paramedic unit with the cast member of your choice, and many more!

The Impact

This project is very valuable to all of our contributors as they will be helping me and my cast achieve our goal of showing an amazing story that the entire world will love. Another valuable impact to our contributor's will be that of for every contribution made, our production will be giving 3% to St. Jude Children's Research Hospital as a partner-in-hope.

story:
Hello!

If you've followed past HardlyWorkingTV projects, you know that we've done a lot with a lot less and you can trust that we’re going to use every penny we’re asking for to create the best project possible.  Check out our channel if you don’t believe us! 

I, Caryn, your faithful #TiredCreator, created this project for the same reasons I've created the others:  it's a show that I want to see.

Short film synopsis:  Broke blogger Brannan is bisexual, recently out, and struggling to deal with life and dating in L.A. When she double books herself for a date, Brannan loses herself as she attempts to perform the opposing roles she believes her dates expect.

When you support us, you’re going to get more than just a great project that is super representative of the diversity in our world, but you’re also going to get some awesome perks! Check out the list on the right, get a screening, get a t-shirt, get a few one-of-a-kind items! And if you can’t donate, and even if you can, please remember to share the campaign. It is just as important as donating!

Here's what we need:  $3000

The money that we raise with this campaign will go to hiring a small crew, a stipend for our cast, food, and equipment.  Anything we raise beyond that will go to incidentals, music, and post production.  We are only asking for half of what we need for production to avoid the penalty of not meeting our goal.  See the handy dandy chart below.

Hey, you’re already helping us by watching and reading so THANK YOU!! Please check back soon for more videos featuring our cast, upcoming cast news as we bring new people onboard the project, and new incentives as they’re added.

When she double books herself for a date, Brannan loses herself as she attempts to perform the opposing roles she believes her dates expect.When you support us, you’re going to get more than just a great project that is super representative of the diversity in our world, but you’re also going to get some awesome perks! Check out the list on the right, get a screening, get a t-shirt, get a few one-of-a-kind items! And if you can’t donate, and even if you can, please remember to share the campaign. It is just as important as donating!Here's what we need:  $3000The money that we raise with this campaign will go to hiring a small crew, a stipend for our cast, food, and equipment.  Anything we raise beyond that will go to incidentals, music, and post production.  We are only asking for half of what we need for production to avoid the penalty of not meeting our goal.  See the handy dandy chart below.Hey, you’re already helping us by watching and reading so THANK YOU!! Please check back soon for more videos featuring our cast, upcoming cast news as we bring new people onboard the project, and new incentives as they’re added.

story:
V for VALHALLA

Rooted in Norse Mythology, V for Valhalla is the story of an Earth-dwelling woman named Ally Thorsdottir (Holly Stanford) who is ripped from her home and brought to Asgard, forced to follow her father's footsteps who happens to be the slain Norse God of Thunder, Thor. She is the rightful heiress to the throne in Asgard, as well as to all the powers (and duties) of Thor! All of the other gods and goddesses are dead, so she's really the only option left.

Holly Stanford as Ally Thorsdottir, the daughter of Thor and new Goddess of Thunder.

She has to accept this power and adjust to life on a foreign planet as well as a totally new set of responsibilities. Thankfully, a coven of valkyrie surround her and guide her along her path to greatness (but not without her share of misadventures). It's the imperfect heroine's journey.

The Valkyries:

Sun Park as Idella, Robin Thorsen as Vanna

Ally Young-Price as Beatrice, Harley Bronwyn Kraft as Sindri

Think a Norse Xena, Warrior Princess in a comedy world.

From left: Sun Park as IDELLA, Ally Young-Price as BEATRICE, Holly Stanford as THORSDOTTIR, Harley Bronwyn Kraft as SINDRI, Robin Thorsen as VANNA.

Our All-Star Crew

Lauren Haroutunian, Cinematography; Jason Henricks, Makeup Dept. Head

Not to mention sound viking Josh Chapman and killer camera dude Andrew Hall, plus our sweet-as-pie production assistants Tiara Rodriguez, Venessa Hall, makeup assistant Teri Olivas, and hair assistant Michelle Rentz. We also had a ROCKIN' on set photographer responsible for all of these epic photos, Kim Nunneley!

The Feels!

You want to feel capable, strong, talented, smart, loved, and even entertained, right?

V FOR VALHALLA delivers empowerment through a brand new world and a new perspective. Plus, it’s funny as heck.  

WOMEN IN TV/FILM

V FOR VALHALLA is on a mission to empower ALL TYPES of people.

In our show, divine femininity is in the spotlight, and we'll explore the complexities of heroism and what it means to be a powerful woman in a narrative format that is both entertaining and appropriate for all ages (minimal cuss words, for you parents out there!). 

What We Need & What You Get

We've already shot the show. Help us finish it. 

  • We're looking for at least $5,000 for post production: editing, sound, scoring color, visual effects, and publicity. Since the pilot's principal photography is finished, the hard part is over. Help us make this as realistic as possible!

CELEBRATE!

  • Join us for our premiere- no matter whether we reach our funding goal or not, we'll have a screening of the pilot episode to celebrate everyone's hard work. We hope to see you there!

Risks & Challenges

DISTRIBUTION: One of the challenges with television and film projects is scoring a distribution deal, or selling to a network/platform so your work can be seen by the widest audience possible.

We have a potential home for the entire series already, so rest assured, this is not an indie project that will fall by the wayside.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, there are other ways to help:

  • Make some noise! Share on your social media profiles, tell your neighbor, your grandma, just get the word out any way you can! Use the share tools here on the Indiegogo page to do this easily!

story:
Become a Part of Skeleton Crew...

In December 2014, the first draft of a play called Skeleton Crew was completed. From the first read thru of this piece, it was clear the potential was there for something more. Since that time, thousands of people have tuned in to watch the adventures of Anthony, Hunter, and the rest of the characters in Skeleton Crew. The series has become a platform for people and ideas on the fringes of society, and will continue to do so as long as the series exists. Produced by SideKick Productions, whose mission is promoting size-blind casting whenever appropriate and possible, Skeleton Crew has connected with audiences in ways I never imagined. We have been fortunate enough to work with talent from all levels of the industry, including founder of Troma Studios and father of the Toxic Avenger, Lloyd Kaufman, who makes a cameo in Season One. We focus on LGBTQ themes heavily, in particular the bear community. 

Season Four

For Season Four, we are attempting to go bigger in scope than ever before, with longer episodes, a longer filming season, and bigger and wackier storylines. Any donation we receive will go towards making this happen, including:

  • Rental of The WayStation, the fabulous bar which serves as our home away from home, MoneyShot$
  • Rental of studio spaces
  • Rental of other specialized locations
  • Costumes
  • Set pieces 
  • Special FX
  • New equipment (lights, tripod, sound, etc.)

Risks & Challenges

Season Fourof Skeleton Crew has been completely written and is in production. No matter what happens, we will be producing this season of the series. Therefore there are no risks involved, and the only challenges are on the production team figuring out how best to navigate the budget.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Tell your friends about the series. This is huge--the more people who watch Skeleton Crew on YouTube, the more potential we have for sharing our wacky, zany, melodramatic-tragicomic view of the world!
  • Share our fund-raising efforts
  • Write to us and let us know what you think about the series. The cast and crew love to hear fan reactions, and your support means the world to us!

story:
Our Mission

In a time of great political despair and nihilism, it’s our goal to highlight the organizers and activists working diligently amidst the chaos to give people hope that a better tomorrow is possible through involvement, education, joy and activism.

In an RV outfitted as a mobile production unit, our documentary team comprised of comedians and activists will travel across the United States to discover and share the stories of everyday Americans working for change. 

Our Team

Eric Bryant - actor, comedian, host, and writer that was born and raised in the Bay Area, and is one of the lead hosts of "Life in the Left Lane." He was the first in his family to graduate college with a B.A. in Multimedia Communications and a minor in Acting. Eric has had numerous accomplishments, ranging from hosting an award show that was streamed in over 100 countries at the world famous Castro Theater in San Francisco, to being a weekly co-host on 95.7 The Game sports radio station.

 Kristyn Calidonna a.k.a. "KCal" - one of the lead hosts on "Life in the Left Lane." KCal's interest in racial equality and social justice was sparked following her experience in Washington, D.C., on the historic day the National Guard was deployed against peaceful protesters at St. John's Church. Kristyn plans on beginning her political career within the next 2 years and is committed to being one of the future leaders this country needs to mobilize people in hopes of achieving equality, justice, and freedom for all.

Josh McClain - one of the lead producers on "Life in the Left Lane." Born and raised in Houston, TX, he graduated from the University of Texas in Austin in 2013 with a B.A. in Radio-Television-Film. He has transitioned his background in directing, writing and editing into becoming a respected producer. Outside of filmmaking, Josh has spent much of his free time in political activism, valuing the necessity of an active and engaged democracy. He has decided to combine his two passions into "Life in the Left Lane"

Kyla MacDonald - one of the lead producers on "Life in the Left Lane." A Los Angeles local, Kyla is currently completing her Bachelors degree in Deaf Studies at California State University Northridge, which she’ll use to foster a more intersectional approach to leftist politics and organizing. The theory nerd of the team, she looks forward to using her knowledge for outreach as well as organizing reading series for followers of the series to stay informed about upcoming topics.

What We Need & What You Get

We believe in the importance of spreading hope and inspiration through our content, and thus all of our episodes will be released free online through our YouTube page. However, we will be offering exclusive rewards for our lovely donating supporters.

Our project has been entirely self-funded thus far, but we need your support to produce the best series possible, as well fueling up Ophelia our RV.

Risks & Challenges

Due to the rapidly shifting climate of American politics today, our route and series highlights are subject to change; the results of the 2020 Presidential Election we consider to be particularly impactful on the trajectory our project will take. Additionally, our team is willing to accept the risk of being arrested when documenting protests around the country.

Our team is also very aware that we are traveling during the COVID-19 pandemic. Luckily, we will be staying mostly off-grid in our RV. We will also enact strict mask-wearing policies and undergo weekly COVID-19 testing. Our segments and interviews will be filmed outdoors whenever possible to minimize the risk of transmission between our team and our guests.

In the event of a positive COVID-19 test from one of our crew members, we will have to temporarily suspend filming.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that budgets are tight right now, so if you'd like to support Life in the Left Lane some other way please follow us on social media, and share and like our content!

  • Instagram: @livinleftlane
  • Twitter: @livinleftlane
  • Youtube: Left Lane Media
  • Twitch: LeftLaneLivin

story:
KATHY GARVER IS BACK and better than ever!

Kathy Garver, who played the iconic role of "Cissy" on one of the most popular TV sitcoms of all time, "Family Affair" is back!  Yes she is, but now she's back as Cissy Travis in "Aunt Cissy"

Join us for the new adventures of "Cissy"

"Cissy" hit the big time as a teenager in New York City, becoming one of the top models and actresses of her generation. Now she lives in Los Angeles, and is about to retire from show biz in order to live a new, adventurous life roaming the world with her fiance, hot shot film producer, Robert, when who should show up on her doorstep but her twin niece and nephew, needing a place to stay! Will she leave town and lead a life of adventure, or will she give up her plans and stay with her family?

Also starring Emmy Award winner PATRIKA DARBO (Days of Our Lives & The Bay) and RENEE LAWLESS (Tyler Perry’s “The Have and The Have Not’s”)  as Cissy's two best-friends, SUSAN ANTON as Jennifer, KATE LINDER as Francesca, DANNY ARROYO (Sangre Negra) as her hot Latin housekeeper, and MILES TAGTMEYER (Broken) & brilliant newcomer, MADISON YOUNG  as Cissy's niece and nephew.  

Created and Produced by SCOTT TRAVIS. Directed by Emmy Nominated Billy Clift (A Long Road to Freedom) and Written by MICHAEL VACCARO (Child of the '70s).

We have a great cast, great script, great crew and now all we need is you. With your help funding the project, we can bring "Aunt Cissy" to the world.  The exceptional cast are chomping at the bit to start production. And to top it off, we have some great perks on our campaign that are sure to entice you.

story:
Hi! We're Nancy and Jill—and we'd love to invite you to join us in Whiskey Springs! Here is a bit about how this ALL started.

Once upon a time there was a little girl name Nancy who dreamed of finding her princeSS. She looked and looked and couldn't find herself anywhere—movies, books, television—so, she made up stories about a world where she could exist. Forty-some-odd years later, she started WRITING those stories. After publishing the Alex and Cassidy series, Nancy began writing short-story series as JA Armstrong. The Whiskey Springs Series (or Open Tab as many know it) began in January of 2018. With over 10,000 copies sold or downloaded of the first book, the series quickly became the top-seller in JA Armstrong's catalog. Since 2018, The Whiskey Springs series has continued to gain new readers, and listeners on Audible. Audible is how Nancy and Jill met.

Searching for the PERFECT narrator for a popular series iS no easy task. Finding Jill to bring Whiskey Springs to life for audiobook was a gift beyond measure—it came with more than a few bonuses! Jill is not only a talented voice-over artist and actor, she's also a successful author and writer. As JA Rock, Jill has penned numerous best-selling and a few award-winning novels in Gay Fiction. She brings a unique perspective and voice to Whiskey Springs.

Nancy and Jill both have backgrounds in theater, and love the chance to tell a story through different mediums. As a team, we are committed to telling stories that depict diverse models and explore the range of human emotion, experience, sexuality, and struggle. We need your help to bring Whiskey Springs, Vermont and its colorful cast of characters to LIFE! Whiskey Springs will be shot as a 60-minute pilot that has the ability to be broken into 3/20-minute episodes. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently in PRE-production. What does that mean? It means we've got a pilot going, we've got some cash in the bank, a few people ready to come on board, some concrete PLANS, and some DREAMS about small-town Vermont. Here is what we need: We are asking YOU to help us raise $20,000 to put Whiskey Springs on the map. Here is where it will go:

To get you EXCITED, we have some terrific perks! 

As our thanks you can get everything from Murphy's Law Pub Ware to Cast and Crew T-shirts and hats, video chats with the cast, Whiskey Tastings or Flights of beer with Nancy and Jill, or even be a PRODUCER! Plus, when you donate, we'll add you to our list and keep you up to date with behind the scenes footage, pictures, and MORE!

 

WHY DOES IT MATTER?

Media has made many strides in recent years. There are more models of gay, lesbian, transgender, bi-sexual, queer, and people of color on television and in film. Unfortunately, MORE is not ENOUGH. Many projects seek to market specifically to the community their protagonist represents. Whiskey Springs is different. We have lesbian characters, bi-sexual characters, queer characters, gay characters, straight characters, men, women, black and white, older and children. It's a town—a town full of PEOPLE. Our intention is to appeal to everyone—that anyone can imagine themselves sitting at the bar in Murphy's Law, chewing the fat with Fallon and Andi, Pete, Dale, Riley, and Ida—and Carol shaking her head at all of it. We want to INVITE everyone to town. It does matter. Seeing YOURSELF in media matters. Seeing people who aren't exactly like you matters too. Art is informed by culture but it also plays a role in SHAPING our perceptions.

Risks & Challenges

Film is NOT an easy endeavor. We have a bit of money behind us to start. Whiskey Springs WILL happen—the quality of the project we can deliver depends on the amount of money we have to invest. We would LOVE to shoot the ENTIRE pilot on Vermont. There is the possibility that we will shoot on both coasts. Travel for cast can get costly. We have a few cast members that we hope to announce while this campaign runs. Most of our resources are on the West Coast, so we are aware that we may have to pivot and film interior scenes in Los Angeles. The challenge is always finding the BEST people for the budget you have in place. 

We have both had success as producers and creators. And, we are fortunate to have EXPERIENCED HUMAN resources to guide us around potholes and over bumps that block our path. 

Travel Funds Running Low?

If you can't donate—we understand! We would love to have you be part of our community. That's what Whiskey Springs is all about—community. It's a place where people help each other out (most of the time.) 

You can help us by sharing this Indiegogo, cheering us on, liking our Facebook Page following us on Instagram  and Twitter.  Visit our wesbite too for more information: www.whiskeyspringstheseries.com

And that's all there is to it.

(If you have questions about International Shipping, don't see the perk you want, or have another question, please check the FAQ section below.)

Risks & Challenges
Film is NOT an easy endeavor. We have a bit of money behind us to start. Whiskey Springs WILL happen—the quality of the project we can deliver depends on the amount of money we have to invest. We would LOVE to shoot the ENTIRE pilot on Vermont. There is the possibility that we will shoot on both coasts. Travel for cast can get costly. We have a few cast members that we hope to announce while this campaign runs. Most of our resources are on the West Coast, so we are aware that we may have to pivot and film interior scenes in Los Angeles. The challenge is always finding the BEST people for the budget you have in place. 
We have both had success as producers and creators. And, we are fortunate to have EXPERIENCED HUMAN resources to guide us around potholes and over bumps that block our path. 

Travel Funds Running Low?
If you can't donate—we understand! We would love to have you be part of our community. That's what Whiskey Springs is all about—community. It's a place where people help each other out (most of the time.) 
You can help us by sharing this Indiegogo, cheering us on, liking our Facebook Page following us on Instagram  and Twitter.  Visit our wesbite too for more information: www.whiskeyspringstheseries.com
And that's all there is to it.(If you have questions about International Shipping, don't see the perk you want, or have another question, please check the FAQ section below.)

story:
More about us

- Miguel

I started studying filmmaking 3 years ago in Lausanne, Switzerland, after 10 years of improv practice. I was already interested in acting, this is why I wanted to extend my skills to directing and camera operating.

I love absurd jokes and sense of humour. Today, I have the opportunity to create a comedy show in New York City (where we spend a semester abroad). This project is very important to me because it is my film thesis which will enable me to graduate.

 

- Laura

I've studied filmmaking in France for 2 years then I moved to Switzerland where I've also studied 2 more years in this same field. I first got interested in directing then I fell in love with cameras and lightings. I joined Miguel on this project because we share the same type of humor. I want to prove that we can create a real aesthetic for comedy shows, which I think are kinda lacking.

Now, we are enjoying this adventure and want to share it with you guys !

More about our project

Ne'er-do-well is a comedy about a European good-at-nothing sent to the U.S. by his parents to figure out what he’s good at in life, and his various job interviews obtained thanks to his weird and well-connected cousin.

Olivier is from Switzerland and has to live in New York for a year because his parents wants him to find a job. However, he has no clue about what he likes to do or what his skills are. This is why his parents count on his cousin C.C., who seems successful but no one knows what he does for a living.

Even if it is a comedy, we want to raise awareness to everyone who is having a hard time with their lives, to parents who have children lost about their future: There is nothing wrong with taking time to figure out who you want to become. Yes. What matters is the person you would like to be. 

Why do we need you?

We want to create the best pilot we can make. Therefore, we need your help:

In pre-production to:

  • Rent locations (a luxurious apartment, a laundromat, an audition room at Ripley Grier)
  • Complete our equipment (we will rent more lights and sound equipment, like projectors, clamps, lavaliers).
  • Rent or buy props. We have heteroclite objects to find, which are part of the jokes.
  • Print our screenplay for our cast and crew, but also other documents such as the shot list, the storyboard, etc... 

On set to:

  • Feed our cast and crew! It's very important in order to make these specimen work. 
  • Buy makeup products for our makeup artist, especially to make our leading role look good on screen (you might guess there is a lot of job to be done...)
  • Rent or buy clothes, especially to dress our leading actor for the same reasons explained above, but also for the other main characters, C.C., Tess, Oscar and Philémon, who have a special look.

In post-production to:

  • Pay our sound mixer in order to provide you the best experience at the theater for the release or at home on your computer or TV !
  • Pay a colorist, who will polish our DP's work on set, working on the atmosphere of our short film. More contrast? Emphasize a hue? That's what he does!
  • Pay our music composer otherwise our short film would be missing a heart.

 

 

 

 

Challenges & stakes

It is our first time working with an American cast and crew! We are excited to build this project with this awesome team! We'll have to learn how to work like Americans which is different from the European film industry.

We want to import our (European) sense of humour to the U.S ! We believe that a laugh is international, just like the message we convey.

We hope to provide you the best entertainment we can create, whether you're 7 or 77!

 

Final words

We are glad to have you on this amazing journey! Even a dollar can help us move forward. Every share on any social media is helpful! Make some noise and talk about Ne'er-do-well!

story:
PincheAls Garage V2.0

 

My wife and I started on this adventure back in 2007 when we bought our first 2002 Volkswagen GTI. We fell in love with that car and I wanted to learn everything I could about how to fix and maintain our “baby”.

Fast forward to 2014, I now wanted to help people maintain their Volkwagens from what I learned throughout the years. What first started out as simply DIYs using a cheap cell phone on YouTube as a hobby has turn into a large community of Volkswagen lovers and enthusiasts. As our channel grew, the request to help more people became real. We would do our best to offer car advice to locals and help them do the repairs. When we couldn’t be there in person, we would do a live stream on YouTube to provide guidance for the project. This allowed us to expand our “community” to all over the world.

In this new season of PincheAls Garage, you the subscriber, are going to have 100% control over what we do here on the channel.

How are we going to do that?

We are going to start off by doing an Indiegogo campaign. During this campaign, we are going to try and raise $15,000 to $20,000. With these funds, we are going to offer 2 options on what we will do for the entire season of PincheAls Garage.

Option A, where you the Subscriber, will decide on what car we choose, where we get it from, and how we build it. Plain and simple. We are going to have a poll system to help decide what car we choose to build from anywhere in the United States. Then we will pick up the car and bring it back to California. From there we will decide, base off votes, wheather you want to build it for race, track, stance, or show... it will be 100% Subscriber choice while still keeping it within budget.

Once we are done building the car, we’ll show it off and then give it away to one lucky PincheAls Garage Subscriber. Yes, that’s right guys! One of you will have the ability to win it. We are not going to keep the car or raffel it off. We are just going to pick a random Subscriber from the channel and that’s it. If there is any funds left over, we will provide the winner with oil changes, car maintence or a full tool box, it all depends on what funds are left, so they can go home and enjoy their new car. That is Option A.

Now for Option B where we go out into the community to help 2 to 3 people with their builds. We will divide the funds equally, up to 2 or 3 parts, based on how much funds we have raised. For example, say we raise $15,000. We will divide that by 2 which would put us at $7,500 each. We would have to subtract travel and lodging, but besides that, the rest of the funds would go to help someone get their car back on the road. From covid to other life situations, in these difficult times there are people out there in need of some assistance with their cars. So why not help those in need by traveling to their house and helping them out; giving them one less thing to worry about. Maybe the’re halfway done and need an engine rebuild or suspension, maybe a set of wheels or a paint job... why not have PincheAls Garage show up, take care of them and film the entire process so others can learn from the experience. We would be able to do this for 2 to 3 people per campaign. And, if this is successful, we will do it again and make this apart of the channel. That’s kind of the goal we are working towards for PincheAls Garage Version 2.0

We hope that you will be apart of PincheAls Garage by supporting what we do. Share this with friends and family and follow along with our progress through our Indiegogo campaign and on YouTube at “PincheAls Garage”.

As a “Thank You”, each backer will receive a PincheAls Garage Perk!

            Tier 1   Thank You Card with PincheAls Garage Sticker

            Tier 2   Thank You Card with PincheAls Garage Sticker and Button plus a discount code                          for our online store

            Tier 3   Thank You Card with PincheAls Garage Sticker and Button plus a discount code                          for our online store and a Personal Zoom call with PincheAl                

We would love to make this a regular thing, but, it all depends on the success of this campaign!

 

Support PincheAls Garage! Join the Community! Be apart of the build!

story:
Yes hello, I LOVE YOUR LIFE!

Yes hello, Steve O'Brien here.  I am the creator/writer/co-producer/star of "Love Your Life."  I dreamed of creating and starring in my own series since I was an extremely awkward preteen.  Now that I'm a slightly less awkward "adult," I have a story that could change perspectives and start conversations.  It's a story that's never been told.

"Love Your Life" is a coming of gay story based on my true story.  In 2012, I came out of the closet and I was 29 years old.  Do you think I knew what to do next?!  Absolutely not.  There was lots of sex, laughs and tears.  And what I wasn't expecting was a new level of self discovery.  I'm sharing all of it!  Oh yes, alot of it is embarrassing and "salacious," as my mom said in the video above.  At the end of the day, I believe it's my purpose to share this story with as many people as I can.

Main Cast

The actors that have come aboard "Love Your Life" blow my mind.  We have cast many of the roles for our first two episodes.  What's really cool about this talented and beautiful bunch is that they are all based on my actual friends.  Here's three of them:

Cortney Gift as Bianca

Pablo Sandstrom as Will

Shannon Hamm as Kelly

Investing in LOVE YOUR LIFE

How much money is this guy asking for?!  Believe me, I know.  I've had many conversations about how crazy this is.  Every dollar contributes to the highest production value possible among THREE shoot days, as well as post production.  Your generous donations go towards:

  • Director, Assistant Director, Co-producer, Cinematographer, Production Sound Mixer, Assistant Camera, Gaffer/Grip, Script Supervisor, Set Designer, Wardrobe, Hair & Makeup, Sound Editor, Editor & Music
  • All meals, coffee & water
  • Insurance
  • Transportation                                                                                                                                                                               It's going to be a challenge, but I have a good feeling.  At the end of the day, I am choosing to believe we live in an abundant universe and it's conspiring to have "Love Your Life" made.  Please know, I will help YOU anyway I can.  That's why I put alot of thought into the perks you can receive:
  • I'll food shop and deliver for you because I love your life!
  • I'll personally deliver hangover cures for you because I love your life!
  • I'll help your kid with homework via FaceTime (I'm a full time Special Education teacher with 8 years experience) because I love your life!
  • For my out of town friends, stay in my NYC apartment instead of getting a hotel for a weekend because I love your life!
  • I'll get you a celebrity video shoutout because I love your life!
  • I'll wait 16+ hours on a standby line for a chance to get you Saturday Night Live tickets because I love your life!
  • My parents will host a 90s themed BBQ at their Long Island home this summer because they love your lives!
  • Director Renée Stork, the woman who changed the trajectory of my life and earned me a Best Actor award, will coach you and change the game for you because she loves your life!

Sounds pretty good right?

Is it worth it?  Let me work it.  I put my thing down, flip it and reverse it.  LOVE YOUR LIFE is going to be huge!

When the first two episodes are complete, we are releasing for free on YouTube.  We are going to spread "Love Your Life" like wildfire and get it in front of the eyes of the people who distribute.  Can it happen?  I think with your help, it's going to be absolute magic.  You know who else is absolute magic?  THE CREW!

Here's a picture of me and my director/mentor/friend Renée Stork.  This is the third project we are working on together.  She expertly directed me in the short, "The Cartographer."   I played the role of bipolar man and the idea of playing such an intense role scared me deeply.   I didn't think I could do it and because of Renée's loving, warm and direct nature, I trusted her without question. Good thing I did because I won Best Actor at the 2107 Long Island International Film Expo.

I also have a special place in my heart for the cinematographer and production sound mixer.  We've now worked on 5 projects together.  It gets better and better every time.

Toru Nishikubo is a Japanese-born cinematographer who defines cinema as a team effort where, when the team is in sync, miracles can happen. His work ethic and aesthetic are reflected in numerous narrative films and commercials that have received wide recognition.

Zach Travis discovered his love and affinity for sound as a student of Pratt Institute's Film B.F.A. class of 2016.  He mixes and booms with his own constantly expanding kit full time.  His talent and professionalism is NEXT LEVEL.

 

Share LOVE YOUR LIFE

Seriously, every dollar counts.  There's no donation too small or too big.  And if you can't make a donation, please share this campaign all over social media!  Slide into DMs on Instagram and press the "share" button on Facebook.  Thank you for your lives.

I LOVE YOUR LIVES!!!

story:
What is Dave & Theo?

Dave & Theo is a comedy web series that revolves around two homeless boys (and their cat), trying to get a better life for themselves. Dave is straight laced, logical and calculated in his approach to everything the pair do. Theo on the other hand is a crazy, energetic and enigmatic individual, seeing only the best in every situation whilst remaining true to his morals. He loves animals, specifically his cat, Jupiter. 

Being two polar opposites drawn together by circumstance, unable to get a break in the world both socially and financially - the boys' differences bring them together in an effort to change their luck around by any means necessary. They break the law, fabricate infatuation, steal children's Christmas presents and disregard workplace policies all in an effort to become financially stable. Their wrongdoings along their journey unintentionally catch the attention of an unsuspecting gang leader who has a sinister agenda for the boys that will take their friendship to its limits.

Our Campaign

The series was made and self-financed by a team of student filmmakers and actors on a budget of $3000. Over a 20 day shooting period, using limited resources and equipment we filmed 6 x 12 minute episodes. 

Dave & Theo has been a multiple year project in the making from pre to post production. We are now in the final stages of post-production and need your help!

From the inception of our project, it was paramount to us that if we were going to ask our audience for their support, we didn't want to make them wait around for two years to see a final product. This is why we are "reverse-crowdfunding" (in a sense).

However, we aren't crowdfunding to simply reimburse ourselves for the money we spent on the series. By self financing the production, we used up every last cent we had (which isn't much as we are students!)  and now have little to no money for our marketing campaigns (to reach a wider audience and increase exposure for the series) and film festivals (fantastic but expensive platforms to get our series screened around the world). Additionally, we are also looking to score an original soundtrack for the series that will enhance the characters and the story.

The success of our series and how people respond to it relies heavily on these post-production expenses that we currently can't afford. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently aiming to get $5000 as a flexible goal from this campaign. Here's where the money will be going:

Marketing ($2000): We plan on launching various marketing campaigns across social media platforms to create as much exposure for our series as possible. We wish to present advertisements to our target market through predominantly Facebook and Instagram. We experimented with a $50 advertising campaign to make sure we knew what we were doing before requesting money in this department, and astonishingly we amassed over 8,000 page likes, 75 thousand trailer views and reached over 250,000 people in the space of 48 hours. Realising social media as an incredible platform to create audience awareness and engagement for our series, we would love to double down in this department. By putting at least $1000 of our marketing budget into Facebook advertising, we could have a potential reach within the millions. 

The rest of the marketing budget will go towards various promoted Instagram posts, improving our SEO with Google Adwords, Youtube advertising and film magazine publications.

Film Festivals ($2000): Currently, we have around 50 potential film festivals on our slate that accept web series as part of their program. Each averaging entry fees of around $50 to $100. Whilst this is forecasted to be quite an expensive process, we see festivals as a fantastic platform to get our series seen by international audiences as well as opening up possibilities for distribution. Although we eventually intend on releasing the series for free on Youtube, establishing a following around the world would create some much needed momentum and exposure that we don't currently have as student filmmakers.

Original Soundtrack ($1000): Thankfully much like we did during shooting, we have used our resources to find a group of talented musicians passionate enough about the project to do so free of charge! However, getting in a studio to record is another story. Currently on our soundtrack to-do list are 8 original pieces composed by our fantastic composer Matt Castley. Apart from this, the series will include some already made royalty free tracks that we need to license through payment.

Indiegogo Fees ($250): Being able to host this campaign does come with a 5% fee from Indiegogo.

What's in it for you?

We understand that it's one thing to support our series, but wouldn't it be great to not only get a riveting series - but some fantastic perks in return for your generosity! To the right of the page is a list of some great value perks starting from $10 (where you can already earn early, exclusive access to the series) all the way up to $1500 (where you can be credited as an executive producer). But if you are just here to donate, you can still choose any amount you please in between. As mentioned before - we appreciate every cent.

What happens if we don't reach our goal?

As we mentioned before, every cent counts! Whether we get more or less than our initial goal, any donation and support shown helps our series get seen by one more person or one more festival. 

The Impact

Whilst the chronicles of David and Theodor are ridiculous, over-the-top and incredibly entertaining, there is a lot of subtext to be tapped into. At the crux of the comedy is a lot of heart and a moving story about the enduring strength of friendships in the event of oppression and ill-fated circumstances. The series encourages people to lean on their friends for help to get through tough times. This is shown through the unlikely pairing of David and Theodor who have found themselves on the downside of advantage, but confide in each other and support one another to get out of their predicament. Although the characters in the series have heightened personalities and circumstances, they have relatable qualities that can be universally understood and empathised with.

Our Track Record

The series was created by student filmmakers, David Hoey and Nicholas Burton, who have already seen success in previous projects. David recently wrote and directed a dark comedy short film titled "A Year Without Play" which has won awards and has been screened at festivals from St Kilda to Nepal. Nick has been acting for quite some time now and is coming off playing the lead role in acclaimed feature film "Damaged" and is also currently in the process of writing a new TV show titled "Naked". Together, David and Nicholas have been developing the series for over 3 years and have had multiple attempts and encountered many hurdles to finally get to this point. Also along for the journey since the very beginning was actor Laurence Boxhall, who plays the character Dave. Laurence is known for his work on Australian television (Worst Year Of My Life Again, Deadline Gallipoli, Ronny Chieng: International Student and Talkin' Bout Your Generation). As a team of young storytellers, we have used what we have learnt collectively over the past couple of years and believe the series we have for you will not fall short of your expectations!

Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you may not be able to contribute, doesn't mean you can't help! 

Make some noise on our various pages and follow us across all platforms! At the end of the day, this whole campaign is about reaching out to our audience

So, if you are feeling kind enough, just use the Indiegogo sharing tools to get word of our campaign out there!

And of course, you can find us pretty much everywhere with the links below:

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/daveandtheowebseries/

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/daveandtheo/

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXgzOrkgJO9lvu...

Website - https://www.daveandtheo.com/

IMDB - https://www.imdb.com/title/tt8284428/

Email Address - grannyflatcomedy@gmail.com

And lastly, thank you very much for checking out our campaign. We appreciate you stopping by!
story_txt:
What is Dave & Theo?
Dave & Theo is a comedy web series that revolves around two homeless boys (and their cat), trying to get a better life for themselves. Dave is straight laced, logical and calculated in his approach to everything the pair do. Theo on the other hand is a crazy, energetic and enigmatic individual, seeing only the best in every situation whilst remaining true to his morals. He loves animals, specifically his cat, Jupiter. 
Being two polar opposites drawn together by circumstance, unable to get a break in the world both socially and financially - the boys' differences bring them together in an effort to change their luck around by any means necessary. They break the law, fabricate infatuation, steal children's Christmas presents and disregard workplace policies all in an effort to become financially stable. Their wrongdoings along their journey unintentionally catch the attention of an unsuspecting gang leader who has a sinister agenda for the boys that will take their friendship to its limits.
Our Campaign
The series was made and self-financed by a team of student filmmakers and actors on a budget of $3000. Over a 20 day shooting period, using limited resources and equipment we filmed 6 x 12 minute episodes. 
Dave & Theo has been a multiple year project in the making from pre to post production. We are now in the final stages of post-production and need your help!
From the inception of our project, it was paramount to us that if we were going to ask our audience for their support, we didn't want to make them wait around for two years to see a final product. This is why we are "reverse-crowdfunding" (in a sense).
However, we aren't crowdfunding to simply reimburse ourselves for the money we spent on the series. By self financing the production, we used up every last cent we had (which isn't much as we are students!)  and now have little to no money for our marketing campaigns (to reach a wider audience and increase exposure for the series) and film festivals (fantastic but expensive platforms to get our series screened around the world). Additionally, we are also looking to score an original soundtrack for the series that will enhance the characters and the story.
The success of our series and how people respond to it relies heavily on these post-production expenses that we currently can't afford. 

What We Need & What You Get
We are currently aiming to get $5000 as a flexible goal from this campaign. Here's where the money will be going:
Marketing ($2000): We plan on launching various marketing campaigns across social media platforms to create as much exposure for our series as possible. We wish to present advertisements to our target market through predominantly Facebook and Instagram. We experimented with a $50 advertising campaign to make sure we knew what we were doing before requesting money in this department, and astonishingly we amassed over 8,000 page likes, 75 thousand trailer views and reached over 250,000 people in the space of 48 hours. Realising social media as an incredible platform to create audience awareness and engagement for our series, we would love to double down in this department. By putting at least $1000 of our marketing budget into Facebook advertising, we could have a potential reach within the millions. 
The rest of the marketing budget will go towards various promoted Instagram posts, improving our SEO with Google Adwords, Youtube advertising and film magazine publications.
Film Festivals ($2000): Currently, we have around 50 potential film festivals on our slate that accept web series as part of their program. Each averaging entry fees of around $50 to $100. Whilst this is forecasted to be quite an expensive process, we see festivals as a fantastic platform to get our series seen by international audiences as well as opening up possibilities for distribution. Although we eventually intend on releasing the series for free on Youtube, establishing a following around the world would create some much needed momentum and exposure that we don't currently have as student filmmakers.
Original Soundtrack ($1000): Thankfully much like we did during shooting, we have used our resources to find a group of talented musicians passionate enough about the project to do so free of charge! However, getting in a studio to record is another story. Currently on our soundtrack to-do list are 8 original pieces composed by our fantastic composer Matt Castley. Apart from this, the series will include some already made royalty free tracks that we need to license through payment.
Indiegogo Fees ($250): Being able to host this campaign does come with a 5% fee from Indiegogo.
What's in it for you?
We understand that it's one thing to support our series, but wouldn't it be great to not only get a riveting series - but some fantastic perks in return for your generosity! To the right of the page is a list of some great value perks starting from $10 (where you can already earn early, exclusive access to the series) all the way up to $1500 (where you can be credited as an executive producer). But if you are just here to donate, you can still choose any amount you please in between. As mentioned before - we appreciate every cent.
What happens if we don't reach our goal?
As we mentioned before, every cent counts! Whether we get more or less than our initial goal, any donation and support shown helps our series get seen by one more person or one more festival. 

The Impact
Whilst the chronicles of David and Theodor are ridiculous, over-the-top and incredibly entertaining, there is a lot of subtext to be tapped into. At the crux of the comedy is a lot of heart and a moving story about the enduring strength of friendships in the event of oppression and ill-fated circumstances. The series encourages people to lean on their friends for help to get through tough times. This is shown through the unlikely pairing of David and Theodor who have found themselves on the downside of advantage, but confide in each other and support one another to get out of their predicament. Although the characters in the series have heightened personalities and circumstances, they have relatable qualities that can be universally understood and empathised with.
Our Track Record
The series was created by student filmmakers, David Hoey and Nicholas Burton, who have already seen success in previous projects. David recently wrote and directed a dark comedy short film titled "A Year Without Play" which has won awards and has been screened at festivals from St Kilda to Nepal. Nick has been acting for quite some time now and is coming off playing the lead role in acclaimed feature film "Damaged" and is also currently in the process of writing a new TV show titled "Naked". Together, David and Nicholas have been developing the series for over 3 years and have had multiple attempts and encountered many hurdles to finally get to this point. Also along for the journey since the very beginning was actor Laurence Boxhall, who plays the character Dave. Laurence is known for his work on Australian television (Worst Year Of My Life Again, Deadline Gallipoli, Ronny Chieng: International Student and Talkin' Bout Your Generation). As a team of young storytellers, we have used what we have learnt collectively over the past couple of years and believe the series we have for you will not fall short of your expectations!

Other Ways You Can Help
Just because you may not be able to contribute, doesn't mean you can't help! 
Make some noise on our various pages and follow us across all platforms! At the end of the day, this whole campaign is about reaching out to our audience
So, if you are feeling kind enough, just use the Indiegogo sharing tools to get word of our campaign out there!
And of course, you can find us pretty much everywhere with the links below:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/daveandtheowebseries/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/daveandtheo/
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXgzOrkgJO9lvu...
Website - https://www.daveandtheo.com/
IMDB - https://www.imdb.com/title/tt8284428/
Email Address - grannyflatcomedy@gmail.com
And lastly, thank you very much for checking out our campaign. We appreciate you stopping by!

story:
Short Summary

Fist Fighter Battleground is a new fight saga about a young man, Ramon. He's not only battling actual opponents sent to knock his block off, but also himself as he deals with an internal struggle with his darker side.

Meet The Creators

Ramon Hernandez Thomas

Ramon a Brooklyn, New Yorker by birth, owner of RedEye Productions, is a stunt performer and a huge fan of creating content and choreographing fight scenes. He's written, starred in, and produced viral episodic videos such as "Cornbread" and "SHOTGUN".

Erica Monet Love

Erica Monet Love, owner of production house LuvViolet & Co. is an Executive Producer, a television and film writer, and author. She is creator, head writer, and executive producer of the serial-killer drama "Beautiful Monsters". 

Meet The Cast

Fist Fighter Battlegrounds amazing actors who will be joining us for season 1.

Patrick Chundah Chu as JET (Ramon's Rival)

Patrick Chundah Chu, aTallahassee Floridan, is a 31 year old actor and stunt man who loves Anime and Food. His training background includes 15 years of martial arts and tricking experience;  along with three and half years of stunts focused in wrecks and fight choreography. 

Brittany Mayti

Brittany Mayti is a Cleveland, Ohio native. She has worked both in front of and behind the camera, having both an award winning short film she co-produced that screened at Cannes and received best actress nominations. 

Jenine Gonzalez as BRENIN (A Homeless Assassin)

   

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Expenses:
    • Cast and Crew (Director of Photography, Assistant Camera, Grip, Sound, Assistant Director, Production Assistant, Hair & Make Up, Actors)
    • Production: Locations, Permits, Meals, Equipment, Wardrobe, Props.
    • Post Production: Sound Design, Music Licensing, Score 
    • We believe in supporting talented artists. Ramon and Erica will not be paid for their work, but we want to make sure everyone else most definitely is. 
  • If we don't meet our $5,000 goal, all funds we do raise will go toward the production of season 2. 
  • Anything we raise over $5,000 will be put toward the completion of season 1, post production expenses including sound design & music, as well as festival submissions. 
  • If the gods of crowdfunding truly bless us and we have a serious surplus, that will go toward production of seasons 2 and 3. 

The Impact

Ramon created this series to shed light on live action serialized anime content.  By supporting this show you are supporting a diverse writing team that believes in representation and the importance of story telling incorporating stunt performances. 

This is a show about a young man's journey to find answers as he battles an internal struggle; forcing him to fight to the death to get answers.

On  previous projects "Cornbread" and "SHOTGUN" we had some of the most diverse and talented casts and crews around. We plan to continue the trend. 

Risks & Challenges

Making a series requires blood, sweat, tears, (and money, also money.) We want to create an amazing series with high production value that looks like it was made with quadruple the budget, which is no easy feat. 

  • Fortunately, Ramon & Erica have self produced both comedy and dramatic pilots, so they know all about the hustle required and are ready to rise to the challenge of Fist Fighter Battleground. 
  • We have called in many favors from our talented cast & crew as well as family and friends allowing us to hire amazing people for much less than their usual day rates, & gain access to locations. 
  • Ramon and Erica are multi-tasking as not only writers, directors, and producers but also location scouts, set designers, casting directors, etc. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not in a position to donate funds, there are tons of other ways you can be involved and help us out! 

  • Please share our project on social media! Including this campaign and our teaser videos.
  • Donate Music: hear your tunes in our show! 
  • Donate your skills- what are you good at? Hit us up and we'll tell you how you can help! 
  • email fistfighterbattleground@gmail.com 

Be sure to like us on social media!! 

instagram.com/ramonxdeadpool

story:
The Adventures of Snow White and Rose Red is a live action fairy tale show featuring two sisters from humble beginnings who live in a cottage in the woods with their parents.

Snow White, a kind girl with a passion for animals and good books, is best friends with her sister, Rose Red, an outgoing girl with a curious spirit. When they’re not helping out with the family chores, they spend their days roaming the forest and playing pretend. But it’s not long before they learn that the woods they have lived in all their lives are nothing short of magical, and they begin to cross paths with the characters they’ve only read about in fairy tales, such as Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood and Alice in Wonderland.

As they embark on their adventures, the girls learn the importance of sisterhood, friendship, and kindness, and that your life can be far from ordinary, if you just believe in a little magic.​

Thank you for helping us share the magic with children, big and small.  As parents, we take the responsibility of creating media for children very seriously, knowing every moment of our show can have an impact on their hearts and minds.

 Our goal is to bring, heart-centered, education fairy tales to kids that will inspire them to become the kind of warm, responsible adults we hope to see our own children become.  

Thank you for joining the Snow & Rose family with your contribution!

story:
My Penis Hurts: A Five Part Miniseries - Parts 2 & 3

A little bit about me, Zach Golden, and this project:

  • I've been making films since high school, where a few of my friends and I received a passing grade on an AP environmental science project video that featured a sign reading "George Bush Hates White People".
  • My Penis Hurts: A Five Part Miniseries might just be my magnum opus, which is somewhat depressing, yet oddly invigorating. Either way, I really just want to continue to tell this absurd story, and I need your help to tell it.
  • Every dollar goes toward me achieving my dream of bringing you a webseries largely (but not solely) revolving around some dude's dick pain.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need some green to pay for production of these next two episodes. That means camera, lighting, sound, location...the works!
  • I can't promise you much...just that we're going to try our darndest to make these next two episodes even better than the pilot!
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will go to my Uncle Joey, who I lost a grand to betting on football last week. I know people don't like to joke around about money, so actually, we'll try to at least make one episode if we don't reach our full financial goal.

At Least Share The Video...

  • We know everyone doesn't have the financial capacity to give money to every douche with a camera that wants to shoot something, especially when there are so many more important places to donate right now (Harvey, Maria, etc...). So if you can't contribute, please watch the pilot and share it with your friends. We're very proud of it, and hopefully it can make you chuckle and give you a brief moment of respite during these malevolent times.

story:
FIND THE LATEST NEWS ON MOOMINVALLEY'S OFFICIAL SOCIAL MEDIA PAGES:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MoominvalleyTV/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/moominvalleytv

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/moominvalleytv/

The Indiegogo updates are no longer in use.

 

日本語バージョンはここをクリックしてください。

Tove Jansson published her first Moomin book in 1945. This was the beginning of the legendary Moomin characters that later evolved into dozens of books, toys, tv series, films and even theme parks that have been adored by millions of fans all over the world. 

Now we are bringing MOOMIN back as an innovative new television animation, which will help bring Moomin to a new generation – and to our screens in a way never seen before. The series will be made using state-of-the-art CGI technology combined with more traditional hand-drawn techniques. Each episode is based on an original storyline or incident from the novels and comic strips. The new series will premiere in 2019, starting with 13 episodes.

We want this to be the most faithful version of Tove Jansson’s stories yet committed to screen so for the first time ever, we are inviting YOU, our faithful fans, to become part of the production process and to create the best Moomin series yet! See concept art images below.  

See concept art images below.  

In 1945 ‘The Moomins and the Great Flood‘ was published in Finland by the Finnish writer and illustrator Tove Jansson. Inspired by the fantastical adventures she read as a child, by the likes of Jules Verne, it first introduced the world to the Moomins – a curious, friendly type of troll. Their ancestors supposedly lived behind the round, tall ceramic stoves typical in the Nordic countries. The Moomin family settles in an idyllic valley – a magical and exciting place, it is their whole world. Eight further Moomin novels were to follow, along with four picture books and a long-running comic strip. In the decades since, the growing worldwide popularity of the Moomins has spawned plays, theme parks, merchandise, TV series and films. Today the Moomins are more popular than ever, and their core values of courage, respect for nature, good humour and tolerance have never been more vital.

The main character in the series is Moomintroll, who is curious, kind, sensitive and idealistic. His is a typical coming-of-age story, as he tackles the puzzle of growing up in his own unique way, while remaining a beloved part of the family.    

Calm and collected, Moominmamma is the reassuring foundation of the Moomin family. Moominmamma runs her household with unflappable ease, ensuring that her family is happy and that any guest who sets foot over the threshold is made to feel welcome and wanted.  

Self-confidence has never been a problem for the charismatic Moominpappa. Childish and anarchic, he does not believe in making plans but lives for the moment and for the thrill of adventure.   

Snufkin spends half the year wandering the woods and mountains ‘alone’, as this carefree vagabond usually likes it. Self-sufficient and independent, Snufkin is an expert outdoorsman who is at home in the wilderness and has no need for material things.   

Mischievous, blunt and just a bit bossy, Little My is a tiny bundle of energy. Adopted by the Moomin family, she lives in the Moominhouse variously in balls of yarn, kitchen drawers, and even people’s pockets.  

Happy and energetic, the Snorkmaiden is Moomintroll's friend, playmate, and companion. She's playful and fun, if rather vain, and more than happy to be swept up in his make-believe world of romantic quests.

Next to Snufkin, Sniff is Moomintroll’s best friend and they spend a lot of time together. Sniff is scared of the sea, storms, hard work and much more. The only thing that will encourage him to take risks is the prospect of riches.

To learn more about Moomin, visit www.moomin.com

We want to produce MOOMIN with YOUR HELP! We came to Indiegogo to give thousands of Moomin fans across the world the opportunity to become part of the production, get their hands on some exclusive merchandise and once-in- a lifetime experiences. 

All the money raised through our Indiegogo campaign will go towards our visual development costs that consist of different (but equally important) sections, such as creating a unique 2D/3D-animation technique, character design, and character rigging. With your help, we will be able to develop a new animation technique which combines the best qualities of 2D and 3D. This new technique will ensure that the series stays loyal to the graphic, minimalist world of Tove’s illustrations, whilst bringing the Moominvalley to life with all its wonderful colours and details.

We've calculated that we need a minimum of $200,000 for the visual development. If we go over that amount, we will be able to expand into other areas of development at an early stage and be able to release more material for you to see and to release more exclusive perks. 

Our core creative team consists of award-winning professionals from both Finland and the UK. All those involved have a strong lifelong connection to the Moomins. The show is directed by Oscar®-winning director Steve Box, who is best known for WALLACE & GROMIT: THE CURSE OF THE WERE-RABBIT. The series is produced by Gutsy Animations, a production company based in Tove Jansson’s home city of Helsinki, in Finland. The award-winning creative team has experience ranging from animation to feature films, and commercials to television.

Marika Makaroff is the executive producer and creative director of the series. She is the creative force behind award-winning drama and entertainment series like The Apprentice and Got Talent. 

John Woolley is a BAFTA®-winning producer, with great experience in animation from a variety of 2D/3D/Stop frame-productions, including many years at the prestigious Aardman Studio in Bristol. 

Nick Ostler and Mark Huckerby are Emmy®-winning and BAFTA®-nominated writing partners, who are co-head writing the series together with Steve Box. They are best known for writing animation shows including Peter Rabbit, Danger Mouse, and Shaun the Sheep. 

Pekka Kuusisto and Samuli Kosminen are the composers responsible for making the valley sound the way it should: filled with adventure and fantasy, through the changing seasons, with Woodies, Niblings and other creatures hiding in its nooks and crannies.

Animation studio Piñata is a world-class animation and illustration studio based in Helsinki, Finland. Their exceptional team consists of illustrators, animators, and VFX professionals, that will be the muscle behind the visual development process.

We know how much our fans love Moomin so we wanted to create a wide range of amazing perks that we know you will enjoy. All the perks you find on our Indiegogo page are carefully handpicked and exclusively designed to our backers. The merchandise will mainly be designed using the imaginary of the new MOOMIN series.      

Note that the Snufkin Inspired Backpack is a model product and there might be some slight modifications and colours changes to the backpack. 

Find more info on the Moomin Experience in the FAQ section and more perks from the right side of our Indiegogo page. You can find more images of the perks in the Image Gallery below the video player.   

Thank you for supporting!

Share your own personal Indiegogo link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or anywhere on the web. If your friends end up contributing to the campaign, for every dollar they contribute we’ll match their contribution amount with the equal amount of Moomin Points. 

Here’s how it works:

1) Login to Indiegogo.

2) Create your personal share link by clicking on the “Link” icon button or click on one of the social media buttons. Copy and share your unique link with all your friends on social media, email etc.

3) You can keep track of your referral progress by clicking on the "Referrals" in your Indiegogo “My Profile" page.

The referral campaign will run until the end of the campaign.

One of the main challenges will be that the release date of the series could be delayed due to unforeseen circumstances. Another challenge worth mentioning is that budgets tend to change. Fortunately, we have drafted a very precise budget for the visual development of the upcoming MOOMIN series to prevent any big changes from happening. If there are any significant changes in the plans, we will keep you updated!

One way to be involved in our campaign is to purchase our exclusive perks, available only during this Indiegogo-campaign or by donating money by clicking the pink “back it” button next to our pitch video. However, if you wish to help us but cannot support our project financially, there are a lot of things you can do!  

LIKE Moomin on Facebook

FOLLOW Moomin on Twitter and Instagram

REFER YOUR FRIENDS, FAMILY & FELLOW MOOMIN FANS by sharing our campaign link by email or on Social Media by using the Indiegogo share tools or by sharing this short link: www.igg.me/at/moomin

WRITE A BLOG

GET CREATIVE Do you have another idea? Go for it!

SIGN UP to Moomin newsletter for the latest news by visiting our official MOOMIN TV series website at: www.moomin.com

The official hashtag for this campaign is #MoominGoGo 

   

Click here for MOOMIN Media Kit

For media inquiries please contact: caitlin@riotcommunications.com

Caitlin Allen | Publicist I Riot Communications 

What does a fixed goal mean?
If the minimum funding goal of $200,000 isn’t met, all backers will be reimbursed. This means we only get to keep the amount of money raised if we reach 100% of our funding goal. It also means there is no risk for you, it's all or nothing ;)

When will I get my perks (general)?
You will find the estimated shipping date attached to each perk. Some of the perks will be sent out before the premiere of the series. We will inform the backers if there are any changes to the shipping dates.  

When will I receive my clips of animatic?
You will receive your clips of animatic in March 2019. Please note that the clips of animatic has not been counted in when drafting the shipping time for each perk.

For what age are the Moomin books suitable? 
The Moomin books are suitable for all ages – whether you want to read them to your toddler or for your own amusement! These books can be read when in primary school but they are vastly popular among adults as well. In other words, the Moomin books have something to give for every age range :)

When should I send you my painting or an idea for the perk ”See Your Art in the Series”? You should send your painting or an idea to us by the end of July 2017. We will contact you about this closer to the date we will need your work/idea by.

Am I going to be able to buy these perk items after the campaign has ended / anywhere else?
Apart from a few items (release of the tv series and books mainly) the perks chosen and created for this campaign will NOT be available after the campaign is over and they are not sold anywhere else.

Can I buy two or more perks at the same time?
Unfortunately, Indiegogo does not have a shopping cart to buy many items at the same time. This is why we have created some bundles, which is an easy way for you to get all the essential items at one go.

Where can I find information on the perks, campaign, the show etc. after the campaign? 
Make sure to bookmark our Indiegogo page as we will use it to keep posting updates about our campaign and perks. You can follow Moomin on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram and make sure to sign up for Moomin.com’s newsletter to ensure you will get the latest information on the upcoming MOOMIN series. Keep in contact by e-mailing us: tv@moomin.com.

When will the series be released? What is the current state of the series?
The first 13 episodes of the series will be released in 2019, the next 13 will be released in early 2020. Right now, the first 13 scripts are ready and concept art is being made whilst we plan the creation of the CGI-Moomintroll and his family.

When and where will the voice roles be recorded?
The voice acting is scheduled to take place in October 2018 either in Bristol or London. We will keep you updated on the exact date and time.

What is the Moomin experience?
We want to invite you for a once in a lifetime trip to Finland, the land of Tove Jansson and Moomins. The trip takes place in the coldest season of them all - winter. Be prepared to spend the best five days of your life in chilly temperatures following Tove Jansson’s footsteps visiting the must-see places for all Moomin fans. The preliminary plans is that we will take you to the Moomin museum, Moominworld and Tove Jansson’s atelier to name a few. We will provide you this all-inclusive trip with high-quality accommodation and flights to and from Finland.

You will get the opportunity to enjoy some Finnish activities such as, going to a sauna and swimming in a frozen lake. Or perhaps you’d like to try ice-fishing and cross-country skiing? To top your trip, you will get the exceptional opportunity to spend some time with members of the production team and meet Sophia Jansson, the niece of Tove Jansson.

What does the goodie bag include?
A hand-picked selection of the most exclusive items. If you have special requests, please let us know at tv@moomin.com.

Who is running the Indiegogo campaign?
The Indiegogo campaign is run by Gutsy Animations and the MOOMIN TV series production team members in collaboration with Spaceboy Crowdfunding Agency.

 

Please contact this address if you have more questions: tv@moomin.com    

Japanese version:

 

トーベ・ヤンソンはムーミンの第一作を1945年に発表しました。これが、後に世界中の数百万のファンに愛されている数多くの本、おもちゃ、テレビシリーズ、映画そしてテーマパークにまで発展する、ムーミンの伝説的なキャラクターたちの始まりでした。 

そしていま、私たちは再びムーミンを革新的な新しいテレビアニメーションの場に登場させ、ムーミンを新しい世代に紹介し、いまだかつて見たことのないスクリーンに連れ出すサポートをします。本シリーズは、最新のCGI技術を、従来の手書き技術と組み合わせて使用し、製作が進められる予定です。各エピソードはオリジナルストーリーか、小説やコミックシリーズからのエピソードをベースにします。新シリーズは2019年にプレミア予定で、13エピソードで開始されます。

私たちとしては本シリーズを最もトーベ・ヤンソンの原作に忠実なものにしたいと思っていますが、かつてない新鮮なものをスクリーンに映し出したいとも思っています。そこで大ファンである皆様に本製作プロセスと、史上最高のムーミンシリーズの作成に参加していただきたいと思っています!   

1945年に、フィンランドで、フィンランド人の小説家でありイラストレーターでもあるトーベ・ヤンソンが『小さなトロールと大きな洪水』を出版しました。作者が子供のころに読んだジュール・ヴェルヌのようなファンタスティック・アドベンチャーにインスピレーションを受けたこの本は、好奇心旺盛な、フレンドリーなトロール、ムーミンを世界に紹介しました。 ムーミンたちの祖先は、北欧国家でよく見られる、丸くて大きなセラミック製のストーブの裏で生活しているとされていました。ムーミン一家は田園風景の広がる、魔法のようなエキサイティングな場所に住んでいて、そこが彼らの全世界です。第一作以外に次いで小説が八作品出版された後、絵本を四本そして、長いコミックシリーズも出版されました。その時から数十年にわたり、世界中でムーミンの人気は高まり続け、劇、テーマパーク、グッズ、テレビシリーズや映画を生み出しました。現在ムーミンの人気はかつてないほど高まり、勇気、自然への畏敬、優れたユーモアそして包容力といったキャラクターの持つ核心部分は今までになく重要視されています。 

シリーズのメインキャラクターはムーミントロールです。彼は好奇心が旺盛で、人当たりが良く、ちょっと神経質で、理想主義的なところがあります。ストーリーは典型的な成長物語で、彼は成長に伴う問題にユニークな方法で挑んで行きますが、同時に彼は愛する家族の一員でもあり続けています。 

落ち着いていて、しっかり者のムーミンママはムーミン一家が安心して暮らせるように気を回しています。ムーミンママはいつも冷静に家族を導きます。家族が常に幸せで、ムーミン屋敷がいつも家族や友だち、お客さまにとって、安全で、愛に満ちあふれた場所であるのは、このムーミンママのおかげです。 

カリスマ性のあるムーミンパパは、自分自身に誇りを持っています。好奇心旺盛で、冒険を好み、予定を立てることはしません。また一瞬一瞬を楽しみ、冒険のスリルに目がありません。

スナフキンは「一人きり」で森や山で半年ほど過ごします。この気軽な、さすらいの旅人はいつもこんな感じです。ひとりが好きで、独立したスナフキンは野外で過ごすプロであり、荒れ地に家を持っていて、生活に必要なものは最小限です。 

バタバタしていて、ちょっと怒りんぼ、でも面倒見のいいちびのミイはエネルギーの塊です。ムーミン一家とともに生活しているミイはムーミン屋敷の毛糸の玉の中、キッチンの戸棚、誰かのポケットの中など様々な場所に隠れることができます。 

いつもハッピーで元気なスノークのお嬢さんは、ムーミントロールの友人でもあり、ガールフレンドでもあります。おじょうさんは楽しいキャラクターですが、少々空想家でロマンチックな空想で満ちた妄想の世界を漂うのが大好きです。

スナフキンの次に、スニフはムーミントロールの親友であり、よく一緒に過ごしています。スニフは海、嵐、大変な仕事などが苦手です。宝物を守るときだけは、勇気を出して挑んでいきます。

ムーミンに関する詳細は www.moomin.comを参照してください。

皆さんのサポートでムーミンを製作したいと思っています。 私たちはIndiegogoを通じて、世界中に何千といるムーミンファンに製作に参加し、限定のグッズを手に入れ、一生に一度きりの経験に参加する機会を提供しています。 

本 Indiegogo キャンペーンを通じてファンドライズされた全額は、独自の2D/3Dアニメーション技術の製作、キャラクターデザイン、キャラクターリギングといった様々な（そしてどれも同様に重要な）セクションで構成されるビジュアル開発費用として使用されます。皆さんからのサポートで、最高レベルの2Dと3Dを併せ持つ新しいアニメーション技術の開発が可能になります。 新しい技術により、シリーズはグラフィック、トーベのイラストレーションのミニマルな世界観に対し忠実に製作でき、ムーミン谷を美しい色やデティールで生き生きと描き出すことができます。

ビジュアル開発のために最低でも$200,000が必要であると算出しました。目標金額を上回った場合、初期的段階において金額をそのほかの開発分野に発展させることが可能になり、より一層のマテリアルを解放し、皆様に見ていただいたり、より多くの限定特典の提供ができるようになります。

私たちのクリエイティブチームには、フィンランドおよびイギリスに拠点を持つ、受賞歴を持つプロがいます。チームメンバーは皆、ムーミンとの一生にわたる長期間の繋がりを持っています。番組はオスカー®受賞歴のある監督 Steve Box（代表作、ウォレスとグルミット: 野菜畑で大ピンチ )により監督されます。本シリーズは、トーベ・ヤンソンの故郷、フィンランド、ヘルシンキに拠点を置くプロダクション会社、Gutsy Animations社により製作されます。受賞歴のある本クリエイティブチームはアニメーションから、長編映画、テレビ向けのコマーシャルまで幅広い経験を持ちます。

Marika Makaroffはシリーズのエグゼクティブプロデューサーおよびクリエイティブディレクターです。彼女はThe ApprenticeやGot Talentといった受賞歴のあるドラマやバラエティ番組シリーズを支える、クリエイティブな推進力です。 

John Woolleyは BAFTA®受賞プロデューサーで、ブリストルの有名なAardman Studioでの数年間の経験も含む、様々な 2D/3D/ストップモーションのプロダクションといったアニメーションでの経験を有しています。 

Nick Ostler と Mark Huckerby はエミー賞®受賞およびBAFTA®にノミネートされた脚本パートナーで、Steve Boxと共にシリーズの脚本も書いています。ピーターラビット、デンジャーマウスおよび羊のショーン などのアニメーションでも知られています。 

Pekka KuusistoおよびSamuli Kosminenはムーミン村の音の製作を担当しているコンポーザーです。彼らは、ムーミン村が厳しい季節を通じて冒険やファンタジーに満ち溢れ、ウッディ、ニブリングそして遠くに隠れているその他の生物たちもいるように音を製作します。

Animation studio Piñata は、フィンランドのヘルシンキに拠点を置く、ワールドクラスのアニメーションおよびイラストレーションスタジオです。たぐいまれなる才能を持つチームには、イラストレーター、アニメーター、VFXの専門家が在籍していて、ビジュアル開発プロセスの屋台骨となります。

私たちはムーミンのファンがどれだけムーミンを愛しているか理解しています。そこで皆様に喜んでいただける、様々な素晴らしい特典を製作したいと思い立ちました。私たちのIndiegogoページで確認できる全特典は、慎重に選ばれ、後援者の方々のためだけにデザインされたものです。グッズは新しいムーミンシリーズのイメージを主に使用してデザインされる予定です。 

詳細はFAQセクションにあるムーミンエクスペリエンスを、そのほかの特典はIndiegogoページの右手をご参照ください。その他の特典のイメージは、ビデオプレーヤーの下部にあるイメージギャラリーにて閲覧できます。   

皆様からの応援ありがとうございます!

主な課題の一つとして、予測できない状況によるシリーズのリリース期日の遅れが挙げられます。また、よりお伝えしにくいことですが、予算が変更されそうな状態にあります。幸いなことに、新しいムーミンシリーズのビジュアル開発のために、大変正確な予算を立てていたため、初期的段階からの大きな変更を防ぐことができています。計画に大幅な変更がある場合は、皆様にお知らせいたします! 

キャンペーンに参加する方法の一つとしては、この Indiegogoキャンペーン期間中のみ販売される、限定特典の購入が挙げられます。しかし、応援はしたいものの、金銭面においてサポートができない場合でも、していただけることはたくさんあります。 

Facebook でムーミンにいいねする

ムーミンを Twitter と Instagramでフォローする

クリエイティビティを生かしましょう ほかにアイディアは有りますか？ やってみましょう！

ムーミンテレビシリーズのオフィシャルウェブサイト: www.moomin.comを訪問して、ムーミンニ...

本キャンペーンのオフィシャルハッシュタグは#MoominGoGoです 

ムーミンメディアキットはこちらをクリックしてください

メディア問い合わせ窓口はこちらにご連絡ください: caitlin@riotcommunications.com

Caitlin Allen | 広報 I Riot Communications 

固定された目標金額にはどういった意味がありますか？
最低ファンドライズ額の$200,000が達成されない場合、全後援者に返金されます。つまりファンドライズの目標金額に100％達した場合のみ、必要額が得られることを意味します。つまり、応援してくださる方にはリスクがなく、乗るか、そるかのみです ;)

いつ特典がもらえますか（一般的に）？
各特典にはおおよその発送日が添付されているのが確認できるかと思います。一部の特典はシリーズのプレミア前に発送されます。発送日に変更がある場合は、後援者にお知らせいたします。 

アニマティックのクリップはいつ受け取ることができますか？
アニマティックのクリップは2019年の3月に受け取ることができます。アニマティックのクリップは、各特典の発送予定のドラフトに算入されていません。ご注意ください。
 
特典「シリーズの中であなたの作品を展示」のための作品やアイディアはいつまでに送付すればよいですか？
作品もしくはアイディアは2017年8月までに当方に送付してください。作品/アイディアの提出が必要な期日が近づきましたらご連絡させていただきます。

このキャンペーンが終了した後/ほかの場所でこれらの特典アイテムは購入できるようになりますか？
一部のアイテム（主にテレビシリーズや本のリリース）を除いて、本キャンペーンのために選択し、製作された特典は、本キャンペーン終了後は購入できず、その他の場所でも販売されません。

一度に二つ以上の特典を購入できますか？
申し訳ありませんが、Indiegogoに複数アイテムを同時購入するためのショッピングカート機能が有りません。そのため、全ての必要なアイテムが一気に購入できる簡単な方法として、セットをいくつかご用意いたしました。

キャンペーン終了後、特典、キャンペーン、ショーの情報はどこで確認できますか？ 
Indiegogoのページをブックマークするようにしてください。キャンペーンや得点に関する情報の更新を投稿するために、こちらを使用し続ける予定です。ムーミンをFacebook、Twitter および Instagramでフォローして、Moomin.comのニュースレターにサインアップし、新しいムーミンシリーズの最新情報を受け取ってください。 メールアドレス: tv@moomin.comにご連絡ください。

新しいシリーズはいつリリースされますか？ シリーズの現在の状況はどうなっていますか？
シリーズの最初の13エピソードは2019年にリリース予定で、その次の13エピソードは2020年前半リリースを予定しています。現在最初の13エピソードのスクリプトの準備は整い、コンセプトアートは製作されています。同時に、CGIによるムーミントロールとムーミンファミリーの製作を計画しています。

ムーミンエクスペリエンスとは何ですか？
私たちは皆さんを、トーベ・ヤンソンとムーミンの土地であるフィンランドへの、生涯に一度きりの旅にご招待したいと思っています。旅行は季節の中でも最も寒い時期である冬に実施されます。凍えるような気温の中で、トーベ・ヤンソンの足跡をたどり、全ムーミンファンが訪れるべき場所を訪問します。人生でも最高の四日間を過ごす準備をしましょう。お連れする場所の例としてムーミンミュージアム、ムーミンワールドそしてトーベ・ヤンソンのアトリエが挙げられます。高級宿泊施設、フィンランドへの往復フライトチケットもついている、このパッケージツアーを提供いたします。

サウナに行ったり、凍った湖でのスイミングといったフィンランドらしいアクティビティを楽しんだりする機会も得られます。もしくはアイスフィッシングやクロスカントリー・スキーにチャレンジしてみたいですか？ 旅行の始めに、プロダクションチームのメンバーと過ごし、トーベ・ヤンソンの姪であるSophia Jansson（ソフィア・ヤンソン）に合う特別な時間も用意しています。

グッズバッグには何が入っていますか？
限定アイテムの中から厳選されたアイテムセレクションが入っています。特別なリクエストがある場合は、tv@moomin.comまでご連絡ください。

Indiegogoキャンペーンは誰が運営していますか?
IndiegogoキャンペーンはGutsy Animations およびムーミンテレビシリーズプロダクションチームメンバーがSpaceboy Crowdfunding Agencyと協力して運営しています。

その他の質問はメールアドレス: tv@moomin.comまでご連絡ください。
